snippet: To avoid the appearance of meddling in his successor’s term, Mr. Bloomberg will leave after the inauguration for an — as usual — undisclosed location.
abstract: Mayor Michael R Bloomberg, self-described workaholic, is finally planning a vacation;  with his third and final term leading New York scheduled to end on Dec 31, Bloomberg says he will leave town immediately after the inauguration of his successor, lest he be perceived as meddling.
lead_paragraph: To avoid the appearance of meddling in his successor’s term, Mr. Bloomberg will leave after the inauguration for an — as usual — undisclosed location.

headline.main: Vacation-Averse as Mayor, Bloomberg Says He Will Take One on Jan. 2
headline.print_headline: Vacation-Averse as Mayor, Bloomberg Says He Will Take One on Jan. 2
